reviews.review: 好评，就是脑子不够使，太难了
очень интересная игра заставит подумать мозгами
1편만한 2편은 없다. 로딩 화면이나 대기시간 면에서 1편에서 퇴보했다. 전작보다 다양한 장치들이 등장한 것은 좋지만 휘트니가 내는 실험실들은 피지컬적인 면이 너무 강해서 별로였다.
this is a great game. i feel in love with it
Easy gameplay mechanics, a little bit tedious in some portions but fun to play!

Мне очень понравился портал 2. Я не играл в первую часть, но с точки зрения сюжета, геймплея, динамики. НУ это 10/10. 1 бал бы отнял, за баги. Но баги есть везде так что лишнее. При этом портал 2 заставляет думать, много думать. Не которые головоломки в основном сюжете я решал около получаса. А головоломки сообщества вообще можно решать часами и не решить. Рекомендую игру. Мне понравилась.

Bois I think Gaben can't count to 3




[spoiler] Half-Life 3, Portal 3, Team Fortress 3 [/spoiler]

Single Player - 10/10 Funny and challenging
Co-Op - 15/10 GRRRRRRRREAT
el mejor juego que jugue, hace pensar mucho y el humor es perfecto y bien light
Вкратце - картошка тебя пыталась убить, а потом стала вам другом. 10 моментов когда он нас убивает из 10
Muy buen juego cooperativo de puzzles, recomendadisima compra!
Güzel oyun zeka gerektiriyor.Ben bitiremedim sbabbshajahhs ama olsun baya bölüm geçtim.hikaye bölümleri çok sıkıcı ve uzun.yani güzel oyun indirimdeyken alın derim.
A very fun game with a little challenge to the brain
оч нравиться онлайн режим с друзьями

Lets be honest, I only wrote this review to gain awards. (wanna buy 
frame avatar) <3
Давайте будем честными, я написал этот обзор, чтобы получить награды. (хочу купить рамку аватара) <3

Expande muito o universo do Portal original, tiveram fases que eu realmente precisei parar e me questionar o que fazer, não é um jogo trivial. Os géis foram uma ótima adição também. Só não testei o modo CO-OP, parece ter pouca gente disponível online e aparentemente não funciona o Remote Play Together, então é algo a se considerar caso queira comprar para jogar em dupla e não tiver um amigo com o jogo
设计人员脑洞很大，我也是，嘿嘿嘿

This game was incredibly. Great graphics and story!
Just Awesome. Great story and continuation of Portal 1.

Valve: I can say my numbers one to ten!
Pre-School Teacher: Well, go on Valve!
Valve: 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10
Pre-School Teacher: Good counting, Valve, but you forgot the number three.
Valve: *Pulls out gun* I'm pretty sure it's not.
Play this game! For the love of Science, it is one of the best physics based games I have ever played.

If you are looking at this and haven't played it, what is WRONG with you!!!

Este tambien es un juegazo
este juego es buenisimo en un monton de aspectos mecanicas, los niveles, dialogos, referencias, secretos y la ambientacion pero para mi unas de las cosas mas entrañables de este juego son Wheatly y glados pero bueno las mecanicas estan mucho mas pulidas que el anterior juego (Cosa que se nota) y tambien las nuevas mecanicas como por ejemplo: El cubo que reflecta el rayo, los diseños de niveles estan bien hechos, los dialogos de voz son muy buenos por ejemplo el dialogo que Wheatly hace un acento argentino me cague de risa y bueno recomendado
A amazing game for puzzle lovers/ speed runners/ and first time gamers. Its a perfect piece of work and never get worse over time.

My god, you got to be kidding me. You have a good computer, money in your bank account, a steam account and you still don´t have this game?!?!?! Buy it as soon as it´s on sale. One of  (if not) the best puzzle games I´ve ever played. While on sale it´s dirty cheap. You can easily play this and portal "1" in one afternoon and have the experience of a lifetime. So go up there, and SMASH that "add to cart" button and buy it!
really fun. play with headphones please.
it is awesome with more levels and pure awesomeness
Its a great sequal to the first game in a lot of ways.

Ce jeu est un pure chef d'oeuvre !
It's basically the first Portal game on crack. 10/10
I brain-turning exercise of a game. Great puzzles characters, actions pieces, and story.

Brabissimo, expande muito bem os conceitos do primeiro jogo. Única sessão que peca é a da 
[spoiler]traição do Wheatley[/spoiler] até a [spoiler]volta na Aperture[/spoiler] , sendo uma sessão bem chata na minha opinião que poderia ser cortada se não fosse o lore. Fora isso, 10/10.
